text: I really love blaze pizza. I love any topping option and get every meat options on it. Quick and easy. Definitely worth spending 12$ on it.

text: This place is my first choice place.  Of all restaurants I know I like it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to visit this restaurant. everytime  I want to go to a proper supper, this restaurant comes straightaway to my mind. ‚Ä¶More

text: This place is fantastic! Good pricing, considerable portions and the staff are constantly very welcoming.

name: Robert Hughes
text: We arrived at this spot for lunch. This place was recommended to us by a friend.  Well, it was a winning. The staff welcomed us with a smile and we had an excellent feeling. The meal was great. We had a great time and we will visit this place again. We recommend this place to all.

name: Mayson King
text: One of my preferred spots to eat. good location, well kept, and great service. I highly recommend them!

name: Leonard Cuevas
text: I sent my friends to this restaurant with my highest recommendations. I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the food there is appetizing and the team is attentive and cooperative. always when we visit this place we pass a cheerful evening.  I warmly recommend this restaurant.

name: Morgan Blair
text: Order a half or a whole pizza üçï 100% guilt free and completely delicious.  Right across from Gold's Gym 3rd floor...Extremely short wait times and very friendly staff...!  Blood Orange Lemonade is to die for...!..

name: Ashok Tholpady
text: Tried the cauliflower crust. It was actually pretty good, and a healthy alternative to carb-laden bread. I love that the standard make-your-own pizza comes with unlimited toppings so you can customize it as you see fit. I put garlic pesto as a base, and it made the pizza too oily so next time I will stick with just red sauce.

text: Awesome pizza, awesome people! Loved everything about it, across from golds gym, inside the Glendale Galleria, 4th floor, I was looking for a cauliflower crust pizza for a while :) it was right there under my nose lol ! Super nice customer ‚Ä¶More

text: Great value for good pizza. Workers taking the order and prepping the pizza aren't the most friendly but you don't have to endure that beyond the order and you can watch so they don't mess with your food. ‚Ä¶More
